DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate various potential factor affect outcome treatment congenital nasolacrimal duct obstruction .
DOC.brief_title: The Factors That Affected Outcome Treatment Congenital Nasolacrimal Duct Obstruction
DOC.detailed_description: Congenital nasolacrimal duct obstruction common condition first year childhood . Most case may resolve spontaneously , remain child whose blockage resolve may require primary probing . Controversy remain regard optimal timing probe procedure . Another controversy relate set surgery . Therefore , try investigate factor affect outcome treatment congenital nasolacrimal duct obstruction surgical doctor past 13 year hospital .
DOC.criteria: history tear and/or mucopurulent discharge begin first week life anatomical nasolacrimal duct obstruction previous probe glaucoma trauma lid malposition craniofacial anomaly congenital mucocele nasolacrimal sac
